content.text: Match ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Everton 1.
Second Half ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Everton 1.
Offside, Everton. Kevin Mirallas tries a through ball, but Mason Holgate is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Kevin Mirallas (Everton).
Lewis Dunk (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Davy Pröpper (Brighton and Hove Albion) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Everton).
Isaiah Brown (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Everton. Tom Davies replaces Wayne Rooney.
Goal!  Brighton and Hove Albion 1, Everton 1. Wayne Rooney (Everton) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Bruno (Brighton and Hove Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
